xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/655889-Calum Noah: The Very First Sword Dance 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Where, when and by whom was the highland sword dance first invented? We think it was danced by Noah's son Calum, when the Ark hit dry land. Calum Noah takes a playful look at the origins of the sword dance, telling a long-forgotten tale from the Isle of Skye. Calum Noah: The Very First Sword Dance
